title: Alice to Masayoshi wa Mukankei desu ka? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life
author: Wakatsuki Hikaru
description:
Suzuki (16) is a boy who is feared for his appearance and various rumors, sadly keeping him from having any close friends. It was the first time he had ever made a girl cry, even though he had helped her on the train. But for some reason that girl, Azekura, Alice uses it as a turning point and begins to learn about Suzuki's differences.

- Baka-Tsuki>
